title: Incolink
description: An anonymous social platform for professionals in Bangladesh to combat salary exploitation and job sector unfairness. Fully developed from scratch.
features: Developed frontend with Next.js and backend with Node.js and Express, adhering to best practices.
Ensured security with HTTP-only cookies and in-memory Redux login persistence.
Optimized data fetching and state with RTK Query using lazy loading.
Implemented robust validation and error handling using Zod.
Created reusable UI components with React Hook Form and MUI.
